## Events.BlockDrag class

Notifies listeners when a block is being manually dragged/dropped.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BlockDrag extends UiBase 
```
**Extends:** [UiBase](./blockly.events_namespace.uibase_class.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [blockId?](./blockly.events_namespace.blockdrag_class.blockid_property.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The ID of the top-level block being dragged. |
|  [blocks?](./blockly.events_namespace.blockdrag_class.blocks_property.md) |  | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md)<!-- -->\[\] | _(Optional)_ A list of all of the blocks (i.e. all descendants of the block associated with the block ID) being dragged. |
|  [isStart?](./blockly.events_namespace.blockdrag_class.isstart_property.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ True if this is the start of a drag, false if this is the end of one. |
